post.title: Speaking Engagements
post.excerpt: A blog post about my speaking engagements in 2015.
post.content:
The original post is here: https://miroslavpopovic.com/posts/2015/04/speaking-engagements

On Wednesday, 29. April, I'm holding a talk "Tales from the client side" on 5th Microsoft Bosnia and Herzegovina NetWork conference. The samples and presentation are available at https://github.com/miroslavpopovic/msnetwork5-sample.

At Saturday, 9. May I'm heading to Čakovec Croatia for Weblica conference, where I'm holding a talk "Building modern web in Microsoft world".

Looking forward to them!

Update: Weblica presentation is available at https://github.com/miroslavpopovic/web-ms-2015.
